title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 201.3 - Notice of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 201.3 - Notice of hearing

State Regulations

The notice of hearing shall be in writing and shall state: (a) the date, time, place and nature of the hearing; (b) the particular
law or laws and rule or rules involved; (c) a statement of the legal authority and jurisdiction under
which the hearing is to be held; and
(d) a short and plain statement of the matter asserted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
201.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
